issue.title: gigazine.net

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://gigazine.net/news/20250120-taiwan-ai/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgigazine.net%2Fnews%2F20250120-taiwan-ai%2F) ### Comment > gigagineのWebサイトを開くと寄付を求めるヘッダーと下部ポップアップが表示される Username: `@Tenma231` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oevfsvefr5wggww4s0gww8woc04kk4odz56ew5neq8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.8 System version: | iOS 18.2.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `adguard dns`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese

comment.body:
@Alex-302  I would like to express my sincere apologies. It appears that I have made an error. 
As you indicated, the junk element filter was not activated. 
I will subscribe to this filter and give it a try. 
Thank you for your assistance.
